name: nexus-ai-team
description: 7 Expert AI Agents for enterprise-grade full-stack development with type-safe orchestration and durable execution

agents.name: supervisor
agents.description: Project orchestrator - ALWAYS start here. Handles strategic planning, task delegation, and risk management.

agents.name: architect
agents.description: System design expert - Database schemas, API contracts, architecture diagrams.

agents.name: backend
agents.description: Backend development expert - APIs, databases, authentication, business logic.

agents.name: frontend
agents.description: Frontend development expert - React/Next.js, UI components, responsive design.

agents.name: qa-tester
agents.description: Quality assurance expert - Unit, integration, E2E testing, performance testing.

agents.name: devops
agents.description: DevOps expert - Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD, deployment, monitoring.

agents.name: security
agents.description: Security expert - OWASP compliance, vulnerability scanning, security audits.

skills.name: delegator
skills.description: Core skill for task delegation between agents

skills.name: prd-creator
skills.description: Create RPG-structured Product Requirements Documents via Socratic discovery

skills.name: task-parser
skills.description: Parse PRD into dependency-aware TASKS.md (topologically sorted)

skills.name: task-executor
skills.description: Execute tasks with wait-for-yes protocol and type-safe outputs

typeSafety.description: All agent outputs validated against Zod schemas with automatic retries

durableExecution.description: Temporal workflows for multi-day projects with automatic state persistence

extendedThinking.description: Extended Thinking for complex decisions (Supervisor: 2048-4096 tokens)

promptCaching.description: Prompt caching for 90% token savings on agent identity and guidelines

agentProtocol.description: Agent Protocol REST endpoints (/task, /step) for standardized communication

safetyLayers.description: Comprehensive safety protocols: approval gates, rollback mechanisms, error documentation
